summary: Oktoberfest is the biggest folk festival in the world, held every year in Munich, Germany. It starts in September and ends on the first Sunday in October, lasting for 16 to 18 days. Over seven million people come to enjoy beer, rides, games, and traditional food. The festival began in 1810 and has become a big part of Munich's culture. Many other cities now have their own Oktoberfest celebrations, modeled after the original.
title: Oktoberfest
